title.rendered: Victoria International Airport in British Columbia, Victoria, Canada

content.rendered:
Verified & Updated on: 13/02/21

Victoria International Airport in British Columbia, Victoria, Canada Address, Phone number, Lost and Found contact

Victoria International Airport British Columbia, Victoria Address: Victoria International Airport
201-1640 Electra Blvd
Sidney, BC V8L 5V4

Phone number: 250-953-7500

Fax: 250-953-7509

Business hours: 8:00 – 4:00

Victoria International Airport Official website: https://www.victoriaairport.com/

Victoria International Airport Facebook :https://www.facebook.com/victoria.international.airport/

IATA code: YYJ

ICAO code: CYYJ

WMO code: 71799

Facilities and Services at Victoria International Airport

  • Shopping & Food
  • ATM
  • TTY Phones
  • Children’s Play Area
  • Free Wi Fi
  • Car Rentals
  • Pet Relief Area
  • Free baggage carts
  • Cash Exchange
  • Parking

Lost and Found – Victoria International Airport

If you lost or received items inside or outside the terminal building and in the parking areas of the Airport. Please contact Airport Security Building at Victoria International Airport

Phone: (250) 953-7511

Car Rental Services at Victoria International Airport

AvisBudgetNational Car RentalHertzThriftyAlamoEnterprise Rent a Car
Avis  Tel: 1-800-879-2847 Website
Budget Tel: 250-953-5300, Toll Free:1-800-668-9833 Website
National Car Rental Tel: 250-656-2541, Toll Free: 1-800-227-7368 Website
Hertz Tel: 250-657-0380, Toll Free: 1-800-263-0600 Website
Thrifty  Tel: 778-402-8664, Toll Free:1-800-847-4389 Website
Alamo  Tel: 250-655-7362, Toll Free:833-771-4976 Website
Enterprise Rent a Car  Tel: 250- 655-7368, Toll Free:833-771-4976 Website

Taxi & Shuttle Service at Victoria International Airport

YYJ Airport ShuttleYellow Cab of Victoria
YYJ Airport Shuttle Tel: (778) 351-4995, Toll Free:1-855-351-4995 Website
Yellow Cab of Victoria Tel: (250) 381-2222, Toll Free: 1-800-808-6881 Website
